See chapter 10 for how to feed 
your baby.
Clothes
There is extensive marketing 
and a wide range of products 
available for infants and 
babies. It is not essential to 
have all of these items and 
remember babies grow out 
of things very quickly. All you 
need	for	the	first	few	weeks	are	
enough clothes to make sure 
that your baby will be warm 
and clean. You will probably 
need:
• Six stretch suits for both 
day and night.
• Two cardigans. They
